page.title: 19FARMING AROUND LETWELL
page.content: The{Freezing station}on the{Sheffield} road farms{peas, sprouts, potatoes, {wheat, barley.}It farms 320 acres at {Firbeck}and 500 at{Oldcotes}and {Langold}that they own. The{Earl}of {Scarbrough}farms 20 acres with{wheat in it and it is near{Firbeck. Havern {farm}owns 300 acres in the area. They have a simple rotation system of{oil {seed rape,wheat and barley.}The people at{Holme Farm}have 8 acres of{grass which they cut then use to make{hay. They then buy some beef cattle to graze on the{grass}until{November. Then they bring them in and feed them on the{hay}that they made in the summer until they are ready for the market. They also have a 70{sow pig {herd.}All of the{male pigs}go to {Doncaster slaughter house. South Farm in{Letwell}farms{oil seed rape,sugar {beet,potatoes,wheat and barley.
